Package mig.view

Package View of the project Murder in GPHY

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackPack
    BackPack class represents the items that the player possesses.
    Bunch
    Bunch is the class allows to display keys that player possessed Keys are add to the JFrame when he recovered one.
    CheckButton
    CheckButton represents the class that allows the player to check the room to pick up some items or informations.
    ConsoleArea
    ConsoleArea is a class representing the interface of the game.
    DenounceButton
    DenounceButton is a class representing the functionality of the button to denounce the killer.
    DirectionPanel
    DirectionPanel is a class representing the direction accessible for the played in the game.
    EnigmaView
    Instantiate all the variables that will need to be display
    GiveKey
    GiveKey is the class that manage the opening of the different doors in the game.
    LetDownButton
    LetDownButton is the class that allows the player to let down an object on the floor whenever he please.
    Notebook
    Class Notebook This class represented a notebook The player's information are referenced in this notebook
    PrincipalWindow
    Class PrincipalWindow This class create the first window of the game who asked the name of the player Then, it opened the window of the game with the name of the player and the current room
    SelectItemInventory
    SelectItemInventory is class that create a JDialog to let the player chose from its inventory an item that he wants to remove The items are given by the PNJs or found in the different rooms.
    SelectItemRoom
    SelectItemInventory is class that create a JDialog to add the inventory an item which which was found in a Room These items are found by the user in the differents rooms
    SelectNPC
    SelectNPC is class that create a JDialog to allow the player to select the NPC that the player wants to speak The PNCs are in the different rooms
    SpeakButton
    JButton to manage the actions between the view and the core for Enigma
    Window
    Window is the displaying of the game It is this window which contains all action buttons

Package mig.view Description

Package View of the project Murder in GPHY
